text: 164 (one hundred sixty-four) is a whole number. It comes after 163 and before 165. == In mathematics == *Even number: 164 is even because it can be divided by 2 without leaving a remainder. *Composite number: 164 is not a prime number. Its prime factorization is 2^2Ã—41. *Base 3 palindrome: In base 3, 164 is written as 20002, which reads the same forwards and backwards. Category:Integers
title: 164 (number)
